variants.Description in input context: c.1234A>G (p.M412G) - This variant disrupts α-Laminin-2 expression and function.

Material used.Description: Primary muscle cells were isolated from muscle biopsies of patients diagnosed with Limb-Girdle Muscular Dystrophy and cultured in vitro.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunofluorescence staining showed significantly reduced α-Laminin-2 expression in muscle cells harboring the c.1234A>G variant compared to control cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed using muscle cells from three independent patients.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was imaged three times to account for potential technical variability.

Basic positive control.Description: Muscle cells from healthy donors were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells were treated with a Laminin-2 antibody blocker to confirm specificity.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare the intensity of immunostaining.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Immunostaining intensity greater than 200 arbitrary units.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Immunostaining intensity less than 100 arbitrary units.
